title: Just put a GTX 960 and new PSU in my stock HP computer AMA

replies.body: I'm pretty sure AMA's are for significant people within the league community, not this random person we have never heard of before doing an AMA about having a high tier graphic card in their computer.
do you have any idea who i am?

No, I just checked your recent posts to see if your name popped up in any threads I have seen before. And all I saw was someone who's bitching about SoloQ and Riot's reporting system and how the new HUD is 'shit'.

You don't look very significant to me. I don't suppose there's anything wrong in me not knowing you.

Is your crappy CPU a bottle neck for you mediocre mid range GPU.

Did it help your bloat ware filled POS prebuilt machine.

Did it remove the numerous virus/Trojans/rootkits/malware from you computer

Did it repair your corrupt league client.

Did it fix your constant lag from you poorly configured family network.

Did it stop you little sister from uploading to PTDF.

Did it put even more stress and heat on your dust filled compact case.

Did it stop your POS MOBO caps from bulging and leaking.

Did your cheap PSU over-volt your components killing them all.

Did you over spec your PSU making it work inefficiently.

Did the GPU and PSU magically upgrade your 5400 rpm record player HDD to a SSD.

Did your GPU reformat your hard drive for you.

Did your GPU set your RAMs CAS to 1 corrupting your windows install.

Does your stock CPU heat sink fail miserably causing your system to underclock due to heat load.

Does you client still take 5mins to load the rift.
